definition: to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
urbanization level (of a city or town)

sentences.english: The author from two aspects the development that melts for BiShan county town has made some discussions.
sentences.chinese: 筆者從兩個方面對璧山縣城鎮化的發展作了一些探討。

sentences.english: New style industrialization and urbanization are twins in the process of modernization.
sentences.chinese: 新型工業化與城鎮化是現代化進程中的一對孿生子。

sentences.english: Urbanization is an important part of modernization and economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 城鎮化是現代化進程的重要一環。

sentences.english: We will balance promoting urbanization and building a new countryside.
sentences.chinese: 統籌推進城鎮化和新農村建設。

sentences.english: During the process of urbanization the chief question is Land expropriation.
sentences.chinese: 城鎮化遇到的首要問題就是徵地問題。

sentences.english: Urbanization and industrialization is the inevitable trend of modernization.
sentences.chinese: 城鎮化是工業化和現代化的必然趨勢。

sentences.english: Much of the infrastructure is needed to meet the enormous challenge of urbanization.
sentences.chinese: 發展基礎設施主要是爲了應對城鎮化的巨大挑戰。

sentences.english: Part three analyzes motive mechanisms of Jiangjin.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分分析江津市城鎮化動力機制。

sentences.english: New countryside and urbanization should obtain the common development in the long time.
sentences.chinese: 城鎮化與建設新農村可以在很長時間內共同發展。

sentences.english: Urbanization is a key component of economic development.
sentences.chinese: 城鎮化是經濟發展的一個關鍵組成部分。

sentences.english: Meizhou's urbanization depends largely on development of mountain area economy.
sentences.chinese: 梅州城鎮化是以發展山區經濟爲動力的農村城鎮化。

sentences.english: Meizhou's urbanization depends largely on development of mountain area economy.
sentences.chinese: 梅州城鎮化是以發展山區經濟爲動力的農村城鎮化。

sentences.english: To build intensive urban and conservation-oriented society is the only way for urbanization in China.
sentences.chinese: 集約型城市和節約型社會是中國城鎮化的必由之路。

sentences.english: The pattern in which cities develop will also affect the economic impact of urbanisation.
sentences.chinese: 城市發展模式還會影響城鎮化的經濟效果。

sentences.english: Althouth a country lad, he was thoroughly townish in outlook.
sentences.chinese: 雖然是鄉下少年，他的見解卻完全城鎮化。

sentences.english: First of all, the overall challenge India will face is in dealing with urbanization.
sentences.chinese: 首先，印度即將面臨的整體挑戰是應對城鎮化。

definition: modernization of agriculture, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
